version_description: 我们始终致力于提升 App 的使用体验 - 因此，如果您喜欢我们的 App，请留下您的评论或打分。

Got an upcoming stay? Get a quick view.

Need quick info on your next reservation? No problem. With our new widget, key details are front and centre on the home screen of your app. Even better, there are more shortcuts to prepare for your time with

To give you a better view of the hotel, we've redesigned the photo gallery. You'll find images are larger and sharper; organised by rooms and amenities; and now available in landscape view if you prefer.
This month's update includes improvements and bug fixes for a better app experience.

Looking to book a room in another country? Not sure how the price works out in your own currency? Our new Currency Converter lets you select the currency of your choice to get a better idea of the price.

Find icons in your reservation summary. Thi

Hello! You'll find the following features in this release:

- Get your next Reward Night faster. Just purchase additional points right in the app.
- Want to rebook a trip? Your recent hotels now appear directly in the search form, ready to book

Now it's easy to view and compare rooms while choosing which one to book. Our new room photos help you decide.

Thanks for updating. We look forward to seeing you again.

Now it's easy to view and compare rooms while choosing which one to book. Our new room photos help you decide.

Thanks for updating. We look forward to seeing you again.
Now you can search and book any Kimpton boutique luxury hotel worldwide, plus enjoy personalised Kimpton benefits when staying at a Kimpton, all while earning points.
Now you can search and book any Kimpton boutique luxury hotel worldwide, plus enjoy personalised Kimpton benefits when staying at a Kimpton, all while earning points.
Ready to book your next trip? Your recent searches now appear directly on the search form.
Ready to book your next trip? Your recent searches now appear directly on the search form.

在新的积分赚取概览页面中，您可以全面掌握本年度中您 IHG Rewards Club 优悦会活动的各方面情况。点按会员资格追踪区域，您可以了解到包括已赚取积分数量、已兑换奖励房晚数量、如何保持当前会籍，以及如何晋升至下一会员级别在内的重要信息。

在账户活动页面，您还可以找到更多详细信息，包括过往住宿的酒店名称以及每次住宿所赚取积分的明细。
Updates include bug fixes and other improvements.

Got an iPhone X? It's supported!

This release combines your account and payment information with your preferences under a single button called Manage Profile. Easily access the most up-to-date information and make any edits from the app.
Thank you for choosing IHG. To make the process as smooth as possible, we update regularly. Bug fixes, code tweaks, new features—all done to improve your experience.

A Year of Activity
Now you can see the points you’ve earned or redeemed and other transactions you’ve made over the last 365 days. Find it on your account page.

Simplified Rates
With this update, the same great rates and options appear more
This month's update includes improvements and bug fixes for a nicer app experience.
更新内容包括用户们所建议的问题修复和内容完善。感谢您提供帮助，让我们的应用程序越来越简单易用。

Spot your Elite qualifying points quickly and easily on your Account Activity page.

Browse hotel restaurants and room service menus, reserve nearby restaurants through OpenTable®* or order delivery to your hotel through Grubhub** right from the app
感谢您通过 IHG® 官方渠道预订。为了让您的旅程更加轻松，我们会定期更新 App，修复错误并提升性能。

在新的积分赚取概览页面中，您可以全面掌握本年度中您 IHG Rewards Club 优悦会活动的各方面情况。点按会员资格追踪区域，您可以了解到包括已赚取积分数量、已兑换奖励房晚数量、如何保持当前会籍，以及如何晋升至下一会员级别在内的重要信息。

在账户活动页面，您还可以找到更多详细信息，包括过往住宿的酒店名称以及每次住宿所赚取积分的明细。

每次更新都将进一步改善 App 的性能，更好地为您和您的旅程服务。

如果您喜欢我们的移动应用， 请在应用商店中对我们进行评分。 或者发送反馈给support@ihg.com。 您的支持会让我们做得更好！

All of our updates include performance improvements to make our app better for you and your travels.

Love what you see? Rate us right here in the App store. Or send feedback to support@ihg.com. Thanks for your patronage.
Thank you for choosing IHG. To make the process as smooth as possible, we update regularly. Bug fixes, code tweaks, new features—all done to improve your experience.

All of our updates include performance improvements to make our app better for you and your travels.

Love what you see? Rate us right here in the App store. Or send feedback to support@ihg.com. Thanks for your patronage.
As part of this update, we've included bug fixes and improvements suggested by guests like you. Thank you for choosing IHG® Hotels when you travel. Please share your comments!
This month's update includes improvements and bug fixes for a nicer app experience.
Thanks for booking with IHG. We regularly update the app for bug fixes and performance upgrades so your travel can be as easy as possible.

All of our updates include performance improvements to make our app better for you and your travels.

Love what you see? Rate us right here in the App store. Or send feedback to support@ihg.com. Thanks for your patronage.
Updates always include bug fixes and improvements suggested by guests like you. Thanks for helping make our app easier to use.
Use the new My Offers tab to keep track of the offers you’ve signed up for. It’s now easier than ever to earn more points toward great rewards.
Use the new My Offers tab to keep track of the offers you’ve signed up for. It’s now easier than ever to earn more points toward great rewards.
This month's update includes improvements and bug fixes for a nicer app experience.
Thanks for booking with IHG. We regularly update the app for bug fixes and performance upgrades so your travel can be as easy as possible.

It's easier than ever to sign up for rewards and book hotel stays with the IHG® App. Quickly add details to a booking or enrollment using information from your device. As you fill out forms, simply tap on the field for suggested responses.
Updates always include bug fixes and improvements suggested by guests like you. Thanks for helping make our app easier to use.
Updates include bug fixes and other improvements.

Thanks for booking with us using the IHG® App. Remember that where you travel, we'll meet you there with a great hotel stay. Please let us what you like about the App and how we can make the experience better for you, too.

This update includes bug fixes, performance upgrades, and improvements suggested by guests like you. Thanks for using the IHG® App! With every stay, enjoy a more rewarding experience, all for you.
This update includes bug fixes and improvements to make booking your stay with the IHG® App a breeze. Please let us know what you like about the App and how we can make the experience better for you.
This update includes bug fixes and improvements suggested by guests like you. Thanks for being part of our extended hotel family and for using the IHG® App to book your stays.
As part of this update, we've included feature improvements and bug fixes to give you an even better experience with the IHG® App. Our goal is to provide a great hotel booking tool for our guests.
This update includes bug fixes and improvements suggested by guests like you. Our goal with the IHG® App is to give you a booking experience that's convenient, easy, and fun.
